definition: another name for Book of Changes (I Ching) 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]
surname Zhou/Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)
to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes

sentences.english: Daniel, do you want to know what's written in the Book of Changes?
sentences.chinese: 大牛，你想不想看看《周易》裏面都寫了些什麼啊？

sentences.english: The Book of Changes shows people its ideal of personality structure in different sides.
sentences.chinese: 《周易》從不同側面展示了其人格結構的理想。

sentences.english: 《Book of Changes》and the great thinkers of the pre-Qin period emphasize the ancient and contemporary significances.
sentences.chinese: 《周易》及先秦時代的重要思想家都注重古義和今義。

sentences.english: Therefore, the Zhouyi's way of thinking has naturally become the basis for Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 《周易》的思維模式也順理成章地成爲中醫學的基礎。

sentences.english: Yinyang Concept is a core concept of The Book Of Change.
sentences.chinese: 陰陽觀念是《周易》的核心觀念。

sentences.english: Lao-tzu completely inherits"Guan Xiang"mode carried by .
sentences.chinese: 老子完整地繼承了《周易》“觀象”的思維。

sentences.english: But as a researcher of Zhouyi, he touched a very high spot.
sentences.chinese: 然而對於《周易》的研究，王申子達到了很高的境界。

sentences.english: Superficially, the Book of Changes is indeed about divination.
sentences.chinese: 從表面上看《周易》的確是一部占卜吉凶的書。

sentences.english: The essence of I Ching is science.
Shushu is one of big branches of Zhou Yi.
sentences.chinese: 術數是《周易》的一大分支。

sentences.english: Have you ever heard of the Book of Changes?
sentences.chinese: 那你聽說過《周易》這部書嗎？

sentences.english: However, " Zhouyi " who is the author of monumental work of this brilliant brilliant?
sentences.chinese: 然而，《周易》這部煌煌鉅著的作者是誰呢？

sentences.english: Zhouyi is the origin of Chinese traditional culture because of its profoundness.
sentences.chinese: 周易》內容博大精深，是中國幾千年傳統文化的淵源。

sentences.english: The five-element numbers of Hetu should not be confused with the four-image numbers of Zhouyi.
sentences.chinese: 《河圖》的五行成數不能與《周易》四象數混同。

definition: The Book of Changes ("I Ching")
Yi Zhuan, commentary on the "Book of Changes" or "I Ching" 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]
to interpret the divinatory trigrams
to interpret the divinatory trigrams
Zou Yan (305-240 BC), founder of the School of Yin-Yang of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
Wang Chong (27-97), rationalist and critical philosopher
the Book of Dao by Laozi or Lao-Tze, the sacred text of Daoism
the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (I Ching or Yi Jing) 易經|易经
divination
The Analects of Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
“Art of War”, one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China 武經七書|武经七书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1], written by Sun Tzu 孫子|孙子[Sun1 zi3]
interpretation of the divinatory trigrams
easy to learn
study of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]
Confucian study of ethics/study of Daoism/school for Daoism in Tang and Song times/Daoist magic/another name for 理學|理学, rational learning of Song dynasty neo-Confucianism
physiognomy
Chinese national culture/studies of ancient Chinese civilization/the Imperial College (history)
